content:
Hello everyone, I have educational experience in geographic information science and land science. Currently, I am a research assistant professor at the Institute of Urban Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences(CAS). My research interests include urban science, urbanization, and urban complex systems. Feel free to contact me.
Download my resumé as a PDF.
summary: Hello everyone, I have educational experience in geographic information science and land science. Currently, I am a research assistant professor at the Institute of Urban Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences(CAS). My research interests include urban science, urbanization, and urban complex systems.
title: Zhibang Xu (徐智邦)
Assessment of urban land use efficiency in China
Mapping urban boundaries for global urban settlements
